description.value:
Worn as a contact lens, spectacles, or other eyewear, these magically treated lenses project a special data display that uses virtual intelligence and rapid eye tracking to quickly cycle through information until you find what you seek. It grants you a +1 item bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Recall Knowledge] checks with the skill chosen when you use Database Scan.

Activateâ€”Database Scan 2 (concentrate)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect The lens casts a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Akashic Download] that uses the lens instead of a comm unit.
